name: Disaster Dig
description:
Refine dirt to refuel

'Tab' to open upgrade menus

Dig and craft to find your way out of a procedurally generated collapsed mine.

WASD to move/dig

'E'/'Tab' to interact and open Crafting menu

My submission for LudumDare 48 Themed "Deeper and Deeper"  https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/48/disaster-dig

Inspired by Motherload, wanted to explore procedural generation and crafting/progression systems. 

Probably runs significantly better with Windows download! 

Have not full tested web build, use at your own risk!

Made in Unity

Sprits in Aesprite

Third-party content:

Dirt Tile modular variants: https://startledpixels.itch.io/2d-pixel-platformer-asset-pack

Font: https://www.dafont.com/mister-pixel-16.font

Noise Library: https://github.com/Auburn/FastNoiseLite
